heading: Equity
body: We have consistently been involved in the high quality IPOs and follow-on offerings given its focus on the growth sectors. Our extensive bookrunner track record for emerging growth companies uniquely separates us from other middle market advisors. Our team of banking, capital markets, sales & trading and research professionals are committed to acting and executing as a cohesive team.
